name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with egg, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.

ingredients: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, Caesar dressing

description: A classic sandwich with layers of turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

name: Coca-Cola
ingredients: Carbonated water, high fructose corn syrup, caramel color, phosphoric acid, natural flavors, caffeine
